Name:
* Gabriel Sincraian disqualified for an anti-doping rule violation according to Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) decision of October 16 2016. 




Men's Light-heavyweight - Weightlifting - Rio 2016 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     In weightlifting the total score for a lifter was the sum of the lifter's result in the snatch and the clean & jerk categories. Three lifts was allowed in each category. In case of a tie, the lighter lifter won. Lifters without a valid snatch score did not perform the clean & jerk category. Event facts: Men's Light-heavyweight competition was held at the Riocentro - Pavilion 2 and 23 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Light-heavyweight - Rio 2016 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database

Name:
* Blagoi Blagoev BUL disqualified for doping. 




Men's Light-heavyweight - Weightlifting - Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     Athletes competed in two types of lift: the snatch, in which they raised the bar over the head in one movement, and the clean & jerk, in which they raised the bar i two movements using the combined strength of arms and legs. Each athlete was allowed three attempts at each type of lift. The best result in each type of lift counted in the final score for the athlete.  Event facts: Men's Light-heavyweight competition was held at the St. Michel Arena and 17 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Light-heavyweight - Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
